dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for gbshopping.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, May 24, 2007 2:56 PM
To: Response, Legal
Subject: FW: DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for gbshopping.com

 

ThePlanet,

 

I have rechecked www.gbshopping.com <http://www.gbshopping.com/>  and
found they are still in violation of LG's intellectual property.  I have
pasted all infringing URL's below to better assist in reaching
compliance.  Please notify me once all changes have been made.

 

Copyrighted Text Violations

http://www.gbshopping.com/product_136504_42PC5DC.html

http://www.gbshopping.com/product_104340_42LC2D.html

 

Thank you,

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com 

compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be
legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this
transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this
transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Monday, May 14, 2007 2:24 PM
To: Barbara Davis; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for gbshopping.com

 

We are writing to you in connection with the below-pasted e-mail from
the third party claimant specified therein (the "Claimant") regarding
certain materials contained in the specified web site (the "Web Site")
that are infringing upon the Claimant's intellectual property rights
(the "Infringing Materials").

 

We are currently reviewing the Claimant's notice to determine if it
constitutes valid notice under federal copyright law. Should we
determine that the notice is valid, we will be required by federal law
to act expeditiously in removing or disabling access to the Infringing
Materials. We therefore strongly recommend that you immediately remove
the Infringing Materials. 

 

Please note that under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, you have
the right to file a "counter-notice" claiming that either (a) that the
Claimant is wrong and that the Infringing Material is lawfully posted on
the Web Site or (b) that the Infringing Material has been misidentified.
We encourage you to review the procedures for filing a counter-notice,
which are set forth in The Planet's copyright notification guidelines
located at http://www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal.asp and to use this
online form at http://www.chillingeffects.org/dmca/counter512.pdf which
creates a PDF with all the required elements for counter-notification
which you can send back to us.

 

Please note that The Planet has only passed on the validity of the
Claimant's notice 17 U.S.C. Sec. 512 and has not sought to determine
whether the Infringing Materials on the Web Site do indeed infringe upon
the Claimant's intellectual property rights.

 

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter.

 

Legal Response Team 

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

 

---------

 

 

-----Original Message-----

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com]

Sent: Monday, May 07, 2007 2:56 PM

To: Response, Legal

Subject: FW: DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for gbshopping.com

 

ThePlanet.com,

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I found two infringing

URL's in violation of LG's copyrighted text. I have pasted the

infringing URL's below. Please email me at Bdavis@netenforcers.com once

all changes have been made.

 

Copyright (text) violations

 

http://www.gbshopping.com/product_136504_42PC5DC.html

http://www.gbshopping.com/product_104340_42LC2D.html

 

Thank you,

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com

compliance.management@netenforcers.com

 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

 

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential

and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be

legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole

purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received

this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of

this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended

recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and

delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.
